de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.dictionaryannotator

Class PhraseTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.dictionaryannotator.PhraseTree

  • public class PhraseTree
extends Object
    Stores phrases in a tree structure to allow efficient access. Used by the DictionaryAnnotator.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PhraseTree() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPhrase(String[] phraseParts)
      Add a phrase, each array entry is a phrase token
      boolean contains(String[] phraseParts)
      Checks if the phrase is contained in the tree
      String[] getLongestMatch(String[] matchText)
      Returns the longest matching phrase in the tree, beginning with the first array entry in matchText.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • PhraseTree

        public PhraseTree()

    • Method Detail

      • addPhrase

        public void addPhrase(String[] phraseParts)
        Add a phrase, each array entry is a phrase token
        Parameters:
        phraseParts - the phrase.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(String[] phraseParts)
        Checks if the phrase is contained in the tree
        Parameters:
        phraseParts - Phrase as token array
        Returns:
        true if contained, false otherwise

      • getLongestMatch

        public String[] getLongestMatch(String[] matchText)
        Returns the longest matching phrase in the tree, beginning with the first array entry in matchText.
        Parameters:
        matchText - Text to match against, pre-tokenized
        Returns:
        Longest matching phrase stored in the tree, as token-array
